storyInfo: One day, Mostima arrives in Lungmen with a letter from Lemuen addressed to Exusiai. On the streets, she runs into Texas, and thus, a day in the life of Penguin Logistics begins––

attributes.content: I'm curious now. Where did you run off to in the time it took me to use the toilet?
attributes.name: Dawn Destroyer

attributes.content: Would you believe me if I told you my life was at risk?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I was under the impression that Lungmen was a city of law and order.
attributes.name: Dawn Destroyer

attributes.content: I'm just as curious as you are as to why random pedestrians would be after my head in such a well-policed city.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Okay, I might actually have a pretty good idea of why.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Go find a milk tea place, and get me a cup. See ya.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hey, what the hell's up with your––
attributes.name: Dawn Destroyer

attributes.content: Texas, you could say we're coworkers, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: More or less.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I don't think coworkers are supposed to draw swords on each other.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But Exusiai's been looking for you this whole time.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And you're a slippery one, so I figured it'd be easier to hogtie you and haul you over to her.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, Siracusans. You always get the job done clean.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I have to admit, though, I was this close to letting you do it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But at this point, you can't catch me anymore.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Emperor talked to me about you. I never planned to take you on alone.
attributes.name: Texas
Exusiai
attributes.content: Hey, Texas, aren't you on delivery? Why do you need me all of a...

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: Huh?!
Hi there.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just happened to bump into her.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Good going, Texas!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Same plan as always. I'm up front, you wrap around.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Tie her to a chair. I've got all sorts of ways to make her spill what you're looking for.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Siracusan ways?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Texas ways.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: El, you're not really going to fight me, are you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The boss talks a lot about business culture. Even though his slogans change every day, I've always held onto one for myself––
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Play hard!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So let's play, Mostima.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Alright, we'll play a little game of cops and robbers. If you can catch me, you win.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Does it matter how I do it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You can even smack me around, El. Use your gun if you'd like.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't worry, the commandments don't protect fallen angels.
attributes.name: Mostima
Exusiai
attributes.content: Ooh...

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: Wait, I can't use guns downtown! And you don't get to use your Arts!
Okay, let's dial up the difficulty a bit. You––
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I won't use my Arts.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But you're still going to use your swords, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: As long as you don't resist too much, you probably won't get hurt.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Alrighty. Three–– (Winks)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Nods slightly)
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Start!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She's fast!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I know all your little tricks, El.
attributes.name: Distant Mostima

attributes.content: Of course you do...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas, have you eaten?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yes. How about you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll manage.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Then let’s get going.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Alrighty!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ya seem mighty busy today, Exusiai.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Eh, I'm okay, Croissant. You're setting a stall up over here?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sure am. Didn't have much work today, so I figured I'd do a little hawkin'.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh right, have you seen a blue-haired angel? I think I saw her linger here for a little while, from off in the distance.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If'n you mean that Mostima of yers, she went that-a-way.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Alrighty, thanks a bunch.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That about satisfy ya?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And here I was thinking you'd double-cross me halfway through.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Y'all playin' some kinda game?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: How'd you know?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Well, I reckon since you've been duckin' her this long, if'n you didn't want her to find you, Exusiai'd never see heads or tails of ya.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Then why didn't you help her?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Let's just say you've piqued my curiosity.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: 'Course, since I helped ya, ya gotta show my enterprise here a li'l love.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Then, I'll have a smoked sausage.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Now yer talkin'.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What do you want to get out of me?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hmm... It's less gettin' somethin' outta ya, and more somethin' I wanted to tell ya.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Since she came here lookin' for ya, n' all the time she spent waitin' for ya, Exusiai's been in Lungmen for a good number of years now.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But I'n see that her search ain't no grave matter o' life n' death. Just look at what a whallopin' good time she's havin' in Lungmen!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: She talks you up as some kinda unbelievably powerful being, carryin' a buncha secrets you can't tell nobody, haulin' a big pile of yer own problems on them shoulders fer good measure.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But it's been an awful long time. Ya do kinda owe her an explanation.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Croissant, grab her.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hey, I got a stall to run here.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Fine. Good luck.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Game on, Texas.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The sausage is my treat then. When yer done with this li'l game, do remember to talk things out with her.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It actually started to rain.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Not a bad thing for someone trying to stay hidden.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Huh? A venue change?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No way...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But it's raining over here. I can't make it over right now!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Find a way to make it happen?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey, aren't you being a bit too unreasonable here––
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What a jerk! Treating me like this just because I'm an up-and-comer...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Even if I hailed a cab, I wouldn't make it in time, and it's probably too late to call Texas... What should I do? Do I really have to throw in the towel?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're Sora, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, um, yes, yes I am....
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wait a sec, a blue-haired Sankta with horns... Are you Mostima, the one Exusiai's always looking for?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I have to tell her...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Aren't you kind of busy?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, I guess so.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm here to help.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll go to her.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Then please, I'm counting on you! The address is––
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You can tell me on the way. Hold onto my hand.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, so you want to take the rooftops!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Here is good.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I can't believe I'm here ten minutes early.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Thank you so much, Mostima... Um, ma'am.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No need for the ma'am now.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But, why did you suddenly show up to help me?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Haven't you been hiding from Exusiai this whole time?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Wait, if you want to say something, you should be saying it to her, not me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh say, this whole time, there's been something I've wanted to ask you. Do you mind?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If it's a question I can answer, fire away.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I want to know, are the Sankta... all as carefree as Exusiai?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I guess, yeah, basically, most are.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hmm... Okay.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I work as an idol. This might sound strange, but one of the most important parts of being an idol is figuring out how to read people's hearts.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I've always believed that if you can open your heart to anyone, then you probably have more than one door into your heart.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The people who seem nice to everyone must be hiding something deep inside.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But I don't think that's true for Exusiai.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Did you know, when Exusiai first joined Penguin Logistics, she was the absolute queen of troublemakers.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She would believe pretty much anything anyone told her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I still remember that day, the day after she joined. The boss asked her to make a delivery so he could test her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas had some things to do, so I ended up being her contact.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: At first, I thought nothing would happen, but turns out...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Basically, you got scammed!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh? Is that what happened?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Of course! In this line of business, it's pretty common for goods to not match up with the sheet on the clipboard, but for there to only be one thing is virtually unheard of.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: There must've been a mix-up.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, I see.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure what's going on here is they're spotting a newbie as a mark to take the fall and pushing the blame for the inevitable conflict onto Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're pretty smart, huh, Sora?
attributes.name: Exusiai
Sora
attributes.content: Texas taught me that too...

attributes.name: Sora
attributes.content: No, no, now's not the time! We need to come up with something!
Is there a way out of this?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The simplest way is to find the gang leader who set you up and have him publicly come out to resolve the situation, but that would basically mean facing down the entire gang, so it's not like it's simple.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Then let's give it a try.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I just said, it's not that simple!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas, when did you...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I heard a whisper on the wind, so I rushed over.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yes, but we're in kind of a pickle...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You said you'd give it a try, but do you think you have a shot?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No clue, but since I'm the one who messed up, I'll do what I can to set things right.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So what was supposed to be a simple delivery task turned into the two of them rushing headlong into the territory of a small gang, grabbing their leader, and resolving the incident.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: From that day on, Texas usually took Exusiai with her for all sorts of assignments.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas taught Exusiai a lot of the rules and laws of the biz, the do's and don'ts, so on and so forth.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And now, as you can see, they're good partners.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Does it feel like she snatched away your dear friend?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Maybe a little. But it's more like I'm filled with a sense of awe.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I just couldn't stop thinking to myself... Oh my gosh, how can a person like that be real?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: This might sound funny, but I actually ended up spending a lot of time trying to figure out what she was hiding and expose her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But the longer I searched, the clearer it became that Exusiai really is the same person on the inside that she is on the outside.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm not sure when it happened, but she became my friend too.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: After talking to you today, I think the last little knot in my heart has been undone.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, I need to hurry up and see the manager. If you have time later, I'll take you out for cake!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sounds good.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: How about you? Have you ever suspected her?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm not the type to guess at people like that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Whatever side people show me, I'll believe in it until they betray me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That makes you pretty similar to El.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What are we gossiping about?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: About whether or not you're a happy-go-lucky fool.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What's there to talk about? Do you think I'm not?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Look.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha, that's how she's always been, from the very beginning.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hold on a sec!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I just realized we're right by the place I'm supposed to make a delivery to.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I almost forgot I was in the middle of a delivery when Texas called me over. I'll go take care of that real quick!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So, let's take a halftime break! Wait for me!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So, you're not gonna come at me?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No, because you're taking your game with her seriously.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The bar over there looks pretty decent. How about it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've been thinking this whole time that you'd get along pretty well with a grumpy friend of mine.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And I've realized after meeting you, that you really are the type of person she'd aspire to be.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The what?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: She's never said it before, but I know.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The feeling of pinning the past onto someone, or clinging to something in the past... For some unpleasant reason, I understand that all too well.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But you...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: For the person she is now, you represent the past she was chasing after, one that will only disrupt her present life.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So you really were planning to kill me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Sort of. I hope you die quietly in some ditch she doesn't know about.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Or become an afterimage that she can never catch up to.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: El's made some real good friends.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hey guys!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I have good news and bad news. Which do you wanna hear first?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The good news.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Another delivery has been completed!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I assume the bad news is you pissed off the recipient?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Stupid Sankta, you're dead!
attributes.name: Hoodlum

attributes.content: I wasn't done talking.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I changed my mind.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If you were here just to play the good mentor, bending over to listen to the woes of your disciple because you happened to be in a good mood, I'd make you regret it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But that doesn't seem to be the case.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I can tell you on that one, that's definitely not why I'm here.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Uhh, did I happen to walk in on a heavy conversation or something?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Should I go deal with them myself?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Nah, talk's over. I need some exercise anyway.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Gah, they're too strong.
attributes.name: Hoodlum A

attributes.content: L-Let's get outta here!
attributes.name: Hoodlum B

attributes.content: Oh... I'm getting a bit tired.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Want some chocolate?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sure do. Mostima, want some...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd Mostima go?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Looks like she slipped away during the scuffle.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Aw, she Mostima'd...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There's a letter here. Looks like it's for you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: For me? Huh, don't tell me she...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No, hold on, it's from my sister!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: El, I hope you are doing well.
I haven't written in a while. How are you?
Mostima should be handing this to you personally. If she has failed to do that, do be sure to tell me, and I will handle her appropriately.

attributes.content: Oh, turns out Mostima came here to deliver this.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But I guess this counts as her having handed it to me, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Read the damned thing first.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.text: For the longest time, I've been thinking about how to tell you what happened, as your big sister.
Not just because it has to do with Lateran secrets, but more so because neither Mostima nor I feel about this event the way others do.
We're not upset by it, but if we have no way to tell you, then how are we to quell your anger and anxiety?
In the end, I chose to hide in Laterano and avoid you, and Mostima also chose to keep an appropriate distance from you.
All we can do is hope that you find new meaning in your life on the outside.
Don't blame Mostima. If anything, blame your cowardly sister who has been hiding this whole time.

attributes.content: How could I ever blame you...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: I once wished that this secret would never come to light. I wished that person would never reappear.
But now I've come to understand that was nothing but an unrealistic delusion.
I've already decided to join the Lateran, and the reason I'm telling you this is––
If you still find yourself interested in the bygone past between me and Mostima, you might get an opportunity to explore it by helping me with my work.
Just to be forthcoming, even if you agree, it may take a long time for you to gain sufficient clearance.
And without a doubt, this will affect your life in Lungmen.
You've been in Lungmen for a long time, and I imagine you've already established a stable and fulfilling life. I don't want to get in the way of that.
Last time, I made a unilateral decision about your future, on my own whim. This time, you should make your own decision.
I hope that when you've carefully thought things through, you'll be able to give me your answer.
In the future, I'd like to make time to go see you in Lungmen. I'd like to have a nice chat with you.
Your sister who loves you dearly, Lemuen

attributes.content: Your sister's a decent person.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Of course! She's the best!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ohhh, your big sis's comin' to Lungmen?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Boss?! When'd you get here?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: He's been standing there behind the counter bartending this entire time.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I popped in right the precise moment y'all walked into this bar.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: This ain't the wrong joint, is it?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: No, it's the right one. Look, it's them!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What are you two doing here?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Baws called us on over.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: He dealt with that pesky manager, so I made my way over here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Boss, does that mean...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Damn right. We got a day worth celebrating, so I decided we throwin' a partaaaay!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: What are we celebrating?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Exusiai's sis writin' her, what else?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Didn't you find out about that just now?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Aaaaand, we gotta welcome back long-term expat staff, Mostima!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: That seems like a pretty good idea.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But, Mostima...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You called?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Woah! I thought you...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just needed the washroom.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Your sister's my boss now. She told me to personally deliver that letter to you under pain of death.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Ehh... You don't plan on quitting, do you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Wanna guess if I've talked about it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There's no way she'd let you, haha!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Aight, move your asses! Booze, ambience, tunes! Everything's on the Penguin Logistics house tonight!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Woohoo!
attributes.name: Penguin Logistics Staff

attributes.content: What can I get'cha?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Chocolate. Coffee.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Cake!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Pizza, and BBQ!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: This here's a bar, ladies! A bar!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Forget it. Askin' y'all's a waste of time. S'pose I'll look in back and see what got here. Just hafta make do.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, right, I can sing my brand-new song here tonight! You all hyped?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Is it the same song you asked me to hear that one time?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That's right! Even Texas has never heard it before!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, that song's a bit too mushy and romantic. Not my slice of apple pie!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That means I'm doing something right! Your tastes are way too flashy. If you don't like my ballad, that means I've got the right feel down!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ehh? Why are you singing love songs at a party? We need something to get the blood pumping!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'll go check if that gang is out for any more trouble.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh... I'll go with you too, since it was my fault to begin with.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Nah, that's alright. I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas, grab some booze on your way back. The piss they got here ain't fit for me.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Anything you want me to do, since I'm technically still an employee of Penguin Logistics?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Uhh... Too bad, but nah!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: What if you had a talk with the old fella in your stick there and got us a li'l show, a song and dance act or somethin'.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: That'd be kinda hard on me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Do you know what the letter said?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Nope, but I can probably guess.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: In my position, I'm not exactly qualified to offer any advice, but––
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You have a good group of friends here. Don't you think, El?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I could use a hand 'er two back here. Anybody––
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Coming.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: (Look, sis. This is the kind of life we lead now.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Even though I should maybe blame you and Mostima for avoiding me, it's because of you two that I was able to make so many friends and find this wonderful life.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (I really love how things are going now.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (You're right about one thing.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (I've lived in Lungmen for a long time. My life has gradually shifted away from chasing the past, into spending every day with my partners here at Penguin Logistics.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (But really, that isn't quite true either.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (My experience has taught me that I want more than just a carefree life with the people around me.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Texas has her past to deal with, Croissant dreams of being an entrepreneur, and Sora will also step onto a bigger stage one day.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (And they all know that I've never given up on chasing after you two.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (There's no such thing as an endless party. But I figure none of us are actually afraid of that.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (After all, being the best of friends doesn't mean that we're living lives indistinguishable from each other.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (What it means is that no matter where we go, we'll still look out for one another.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (So by the time you come to find me, you might be in for a big surprise.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (After all, I'm sure I'll give you a very firm answer––)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What'cha spacin' out for, Exusiai?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Get over here and help me PUMP IT UP!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Coming!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Come one, come all. All the friends who've crossed our paths, all the unlucky fools who've crossed us. Let us all enjoy some––
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Apple pie!
attributes.name: Exusiai
